extendedInfo.description: The best video player on Android! Watch any of your videos on a phone without conversion, anytime and anywhere.We feature the best playback experience and quality.Our video player supports:All video formats (need to choose "software decoding" mode in most cases)Popular subtitle formats such as SRT, ASS, and SAASubtitles built in MKV, MPV, MOV, and othersMulti-audio streams and multi-subtitlesPlaylists and continuous play on same type filesVideos streamed through HTTP, RTSP protocolsMedia libraries and sort videos by typeThumbnail displays of videos---Make the best player for Android platform can not satisfy us now! Now we want to develop a perfection software on Android. If you have any suggestions or bugs, you are welcome to notify us by the following ways:email: mobo@moboplayer.comWe will attach importance to your feedbacks--MoboPlayer dynamically linked to FFmpeg shared library, which was compiled to contain LGPL decoders and splitters only. Source codes can be downloaded from our website.--KW:bestplayer mplayer rockplayer videoplayer ffmpeg mobo moive

reviews.comment: cant use the jump function...the video needs to begin from the very start and cant watch the portion of the video i want...this happens for some large videos esp. movies...i still love mx player that they can play any video format and can jump to scene i want plus the aspect ratio is great and you can even customized it...\tI cant use the jump function...the video needs to begin from the very start and can\'t watch the portion of the video i want...this happens for some large videos esp. movies...i still love mx player that they can play any video format and can jump to scene i want plus the aspect ratio is great and you can even customized it... ^_^ Please improve this app even more...but i still give you guys 5star...coz i love moboteam! kudos for your hardwork to improve this app...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: But can we made pop up play move around outside screen like bs player?:) i dont like bs coz cant play my long flv format video and can we have screen rotation button?sorry if i ask too much :)

reviews.title: Not at all working
reviews.comment: Previisly this app is excellent but now after installing it hangs and asked to force close...  Please dont dwnload

reviews.title: My favorite video app
reviews.comment: Plays what I need it to. When I need it too. Really like being able to make it play in a floating window while I read a text or browse the web. Never have had any problems with MOBO. ***Request ***  Please add some audio support like mono/stereo, EQ, and audio amplifier/booster.
reviews.author: Derek Humfleet

reviews.title: Very usefull!
reviews.comment: Great apps! Been checking most if my videos and so far its good, better try it to believe it!
reviews.author: froiske milan

reviews.title: Good player
reviews.comment: Plays at desktop or laptop OS level never have to worry about  various video formats, plays most of them
reviews.author: sanjay katke

reviews.title: Not compatible with Nexus 7
reviews.comment: It kept crashing on mine. There was no sound on my .mkv files either.
reviews.author: Francesca Cimino

reviews.title: Creates file weiqian_record.txt at root of SD card
reviews.comment: I searched hard for culprit that always creates file at ROOT of my SDCARD, and this app is it! Developers, I don\'t want your app to create file /sdcard/weiqian_record.txt !!!!  Don\'t make mess on user\'s memory.
reviews.author: Michal Bacik

reviews.title: Best video player for Android
reviews.comment: Wonderful app. Works great and looks good.
reviews.author: Anja K

reviews.title: No longer supporting A500?
reviews.comment: When did you stop support for android tablets like the A500?  I\'m running the latest ICS, did a clean up on my tablet, and now I\'m informed that moboplayer is not compatible with my device (I swear, I was running it yesterday!).  Anyone else notice this?
reviews.author: Gregg Cohen

reviews.title: Last update is borked
reviews.comment: A500 with ICS, most vids won\'t play, or if I\'m lucky, only play in slooow fallback mode.
reviews.author: Ninke Westra

reviews.title: Only audio, no video
reviews.comment: Was working great with RMVB. Since the ICS update on the Galaxy Tab 10.1, I get only audio with no video with RMVB files.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I tried to re-install it bt still it is saying that it stopped unexpectedly...so have to force close

reviews.comment: If I may request...I would love to see a 4x4 or adjustable widget for this app. It is an amazing app.

reviews.comment: Its a nice player, but mkv files not played that well.would give a 5 , if it were not so.

reviews.title: Excellent video player
reviews.comment: I really want to donate. Do you guys have a PayPal account I can send money to? It\'s a lot more convenient.

reviews.title: Amazing video player
reviews.comment: I love this app just wish they had a shuffle for video playlist
